name: Add expenses and submit

testSteps.description: 1: Add expenses and submit ({ExpenseType=Planned Surgery, Amount=100, Date=2025-02-01, Note=Meal})

children.description: Given user is logged in as an Admin
Given the user is on the Claims Page
Open claims page
When the user clicks the Submit Claim button
Click submit claim button
And the user is navigated to the Submit Claim page
Verify submit claim page
And the user selects the Event "Medical Reimbursement"
Select event: Medical Reimbursement
And the user selects the Currency "United States Dollar"
Select currency: United States Dollar
And the user enters Remarks "Hospital Stay"
Enter remarks: Hospital Stay
And the user clicks the Create button
Click create button
Then the user is directed to the View Claim page
Verify navigate to view claim page
And the user should see the claim details Event "Medical Reimbursement" and Currency "United States Dollar" and Remarks "Hospital Stay"
Verify claim details: Medical Reimbursement, United States Dollar, Hospital Stay
Given the user is directed to the View Claim page
Verify navigate to view claim page
When the user clicks the Add Expenses button
Click add button
Then the add expenses modal should be displayed
Verify add expense modal
And the user selects the Expense Type "Planned Surgery"
Select expense type: Planned Surgery
And the user enters the Amount "100"
Enter expense amount: 100
And the user enters the Date "2025-02-01"
Enter expense date: 2025-02-01
And the user enters the Note "Meal"
Enter expense note: Meal
And the user clicks the save button
Click save button
Then the user should see the expense details Expense Type "Planned Surgery" and Amount "100" and Date "2025-02-01" and Note "Meal"
Verify expense details: Planned Surgery, 100, 2025-02-01, Meal
When the user clicks the Submit button
Click submit button
Then the user should see the claim status as "Submitted"
Verify claim status: Submitted

title: Add expenses and submit

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given the user is directed to the View Claim page
When the user clicks the Add Expenses button
Then the add expenses modal should be displayed
And the user selects the Expense Type "<ExpenseType>"
And the user enters the Amount "<Amount>"
And the user enters the Date "<Date>"
And the user enters the Note "<Note>"
And the user clicks the save button
Then the user should see the expense details Expense Type "<ExpenseType>" and Amount "<Amount>" and Date "<Date>" and Note "<Note>"
When the user clicks the Submit button
Then the user should see the claim status as "Submitted"

scenarioOutline:
Given the user is directed to the View Claim page
When the user clicks the Add Expenses button
Then the add expenses modal should be displayed
And the user selects the Expense Type "<ExpenseType>"
And the user enters the Amount "<Amount>"
And the user enters the Date "<Date>"
And the user enters the Note "<Note>"
And the user clicks the save button
Then the user should see the expense details Expense Type "<ExpenseType>" and Amount "<Amount>" and Date "<Date>" and Note "<Note>"
When the user clicks the Submit button
Then the user should see the claim status as "Submitted"
